posts.name: Hominy Grill
posts.note: Hominy Grill is a busy yet relaxed eatery dishing up Low-country classics in homey digs, also popular for its brunch. You need to order the Charleston Nasty Biscuit of fried chicken, white cheddar, and top with sausage gravy.

posts.name: Scott's BarBQue
posts.note: Scott's BarBQue is a longtime BBQ joint offering pit-roasted pork and chicken, plus boiled peanuts, in a rustic old house. If Anthony Bourdain and Sean Brock endorse it, I'm getting there.
